actions.name: Dread Wings

cost.trigger: The user causes a creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with Oblivion Wing

actions.description:
Trigger: The user causes a creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with Oblivion Wing

Effect: Connection - Oblivion Wing. The user gains 4 Ticks of HP.

actions.name: Dread Wings
actions.description: Passive: The user's Dark-Type attacks are now Super Effective against Fairy-Type creatures. If the user causes a creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with Oblivion Wing, they immediately recover 4 Ticks of HP.

system.description:
Trigger: The user causes a creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with Oblivion Wing

Effect: Connection - Oblivion Wing. The user gains 4 Ticks of HP. Passive: The user's Dark-Type attacks are now Super Effective against Fairy-Type creatures. If the user causes a creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with Oblivion Wing, they immediately recover 4 Ticks of HP.
